item.title: Problem 2191 Sort the Jumbled Number
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 2191 Question You are given a 0-indexed integer array mapping which represents the mapping rule of a shuffled decimal system.

item.title: Problem 1598 Crawler Log Folder
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 1598 Question The Leetcode file system keeps a log each time some user performs a change folder operation.

item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 2582 Question There are n people standing in a line labeled from 1 to n.

item.title: Problem 2058 Find the Minimum and Maximum Number of Nodes Between Critical Points

item.title: Problem 633 Sum of Square Numbers
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 633 Question Given a non-negative integer c, decide whether there are two integers a and b such that a^2 + b^2 = c.

item.title: Problem 786 K th Smallest Prime Fraction
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 786 Question You are given a sorted integer array arr containing 1 and prime numbers, where all the integers of arr are unique.
